data.eml:eml: A new freshwater leech species of Helobdella (Annelida: Glossiphoniidae) from central Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oceguera-Figueroa, Alejandro, Leon-Regagnon, Virginia (2005): A new freshwater leech species of Helobdella (Annelida: Glossiphoniidae) from central Mexico. Zootaxa 976: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171332
